title: book_A_War_Like_No_Other
text:
ISBN-13: 9780812969702.
ISBN-10: 0812969707.
Title: A War Like No Other.
Subtitle: How the Athenians And Spartans Fought the Peloponnesian War.
Authors: Victor Davis Hanson.
Categories: History.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=v7q94Nxje8MC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: A colorful history of the Peloponnesian War and its dramatic repercussions on the history of ancient Greece brings to life the events of the conflict, its impact on the great city-states of Athens and Sparta, and the personalities involved, including Pericles, Alcibiades, Sophocles, Thucydides, and others. Reprint. 35,000 first printing..
Published Year: 2006.
Average Rating: 4.11.
Number of Pages: 397.
Ratings Count: 1601.
